${modID}:CalciumDeficiencyCard.NAME: Calcium Deficiency
${modID}:CalciumDeficiencyCard.DESCRIPTION: At the end of the turn, lose 3 Calcium.
${modID}:CalciumDeficiencyCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of the turn, lose 3 Calcium.

${modID}:BottleHolderCard.NAME: Bottle Holder
${modID}:BottleHolderCard.DESCRIPTION: Add Empty Bottles to your hand until your hand is full.
${modID}:BottleHolderCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add Empty Bottles to your hand until your hand is full.

${modID}:MilkSplashCard.NAME: Milk Splash
${modID}:MilkSplashCard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Bottled. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:MilkSplashCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Bottled. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:MilkChugCard.NAME: Milk Chug
${modID}:MilkChugCard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Calcium. NL Bottled. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:MilkChugCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Calcium. NL Bottled. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:MilkCoatingCard.NAME: Milk Coating
${modID}:MilkCoatingCard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and !M! Calcium. NL Bottled. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:MilkCoatingCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and !M! Calcium. NL Bottled. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:MilkSpillCard.NAME: Milk Spill
${modID}:MilkSpillCard.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Bottled. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:MilkSpillCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Bottled. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:LongLifeMilkCard.NAME: Long-Life Milk
${modID}:LongLifeMilkCard.DESCRIPTION: Retain. Gain !B! Block. NL Bottled. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:LongLifeMilkCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. Gain !B! Block. NL Bottled. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:MilkSnortCard.NAME: Milk Snort
${modID}:MilkSnortCard.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! Strength for the rest of this turn. Bottled. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:MilkSnortCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! Strength for the rest of this turn. Bottled. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:CattleFarmCard.NAME: Cattle Farm
${modID}:CattleFarmCard.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! random Milk card to your hand every turn.
${modID}:CattleFarmCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add !M! random Milk card to your hand every turn.

${modID}:DiscountDairyCard.NAME: Discount Dairy
${modID}:DiscountDairyCard.DESCRIPTION: Add X (+ 1) random Milk cards to your hand. They cost 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:DiscountDairyCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add X (+ 1) random Milk cards to your hand. They cost 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:MilkersCard.NAME: Milkers
${modID}:MilkersCard.DESCRIPTION: Add 3 random Milk cards to your hand.
${modID}:MilkersCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add 3 random Milk cards to your hand.

${modID}:MilkmansRoundsCard.NAME: Milkman's Rounds
${modID}:MilkmansRoundsCard.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle 5 random Milk cards into your draw pile.
${modID}:MilkmansRoundsCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle 5 random Milk cards into your draw pile.

${modID}:SpareBucketCard.NAME: Spare Bucket
${modID}:SpareBucketCard.DESCRIPTION: Your Bucket cards are played !M! additional time.
${modID}:SpareBucketCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your Bucket cards are played !M! additional time.

${modID}:DentedBucketCard.NAME: Dented Bucket
${modID}:DentedBucketCard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Whenever you use this card, permanently reduce this card's damage by 1.
${modID}:DentedBucketCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Whenever you use this card, permanently reduce this card's damage by 1.

${modID}:FlickMilkTopCard.NAME: Flick Milk Top
${modID}:FlickMilkTopCard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Shuffle this card into your draw pile.
${modID}:FlickMilkTopCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Shuffle this card into your draw pile.

${modID}:MissingPersonCard.NAME: Missing Person
${modID}:MissingPersonCard.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle 1 Lost Child into your discard pile. Exhaust. Ethereal.
${modID}:MissingPersonCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle 1 Lost Child into your discard pile. Exhaust. Ethereal.

${modID}:LostChildCard.NAME: Lost Child
${modID}:LostChildCard.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !M! Relieved Relative(s) into your draw pile. Exhaust. Ethereal.
${modID}:LostChildCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !M! Relieved Relative(s) into your draw pile. Exhaust. Ethereal.

${modID}:ExpirationDateCard.NAME: Expiration Date
${modID}:ExpirationDateCard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Gain !B! Block next turn. Lose !M! Dexterity.
${modID}:ExpirationDateCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Gain !B! Block next turn. Lose !M! Dexterity.

${modID}:WorkOutCard.NAME: Work Out
${modID}:WorkOutCard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Weak and !M! Vulnerable. Gain 2 Strength and 2 Dexterity.
${modID}:WorkOutCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Weak and !M! Vulnerable. Gain 2 Strength and 2 Dexterity.

${modID}:WasteNotCard.NAME: Waste Not
${modID}:WasteNotCard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Whenever you play a card, increase its Block by !M! this combat. NL Ethereal.
${modID}:WasteNotCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Whenever you play a card, increase its Block by !M! this combat. NL Ethereal.

${modID}:SkimmingProcessCard.NAME: Skimming Process
${modID}:SkimmingProcessCard.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand. Add 1 random Milk card to your hand for each Exhausted card.
${modID}:SkimmingProcessCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand. Add 1 random Milk card to your hand for each Exhausted card.

${modID}:RepeatOnCard.NAME: Repeat On
${modID}:RepeatOnCard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X + !M! times. Can be Upgraded any number of times.
${modID}:RepeatOnCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X + !M! times. Can be Upgraded any number of times.

${modID}:GrowthSpurtCard.NAME: Growth Spurt
${modID}:GrowthSpurtCard.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain X(+1) Calcium.
${modID}:GrowthSpurtCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain X(+1) Calcium.

${modID}:OvergrownCard.NAME: Overgrown
${modID}:OvergrownCard.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain Block equal to your Calcium. (Gain 3 Calcium.)
${modID}:OvergrownCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain Block equal to your Calcium. (Gain 3 Calcium.)

${modID}:GrowingPainsCard.NAME: Growing Pains
${modID}:GrowingPainsCard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain Calcium equal to unblocked damage dealt.
${modID}:GrowingPainsCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain Calcium equal to unblocked damage dealt.

${modID}:ThickSkullCard.NAME: Thick Skull
${modID}:ThickSkullCard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If you have at least 1 Calcium, gain !M! additional Block.
${modID}:ThickSkullCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If you have at least 1 Calcium, gain !M! additional Block.

${modID}:KnuckleSandwichCard.NAME: Knuckle Sandwich
${modID}:KnuckleSandwichCard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Calcium to the target.
${modID}:KnuckleSandwichCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Calcium to the target.

${modID}:BullyCard.NAME: Bully
${modID}:BullyCard.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Calcium. Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.
${modID}:BullyCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Calcium. Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

${modID}:FemurCard.NAME: Femur
${modID}:FemurCard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Calcium, then draw 1 card for each Calcium you have.
${modID}:FemurCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Calcium, then draw 1 card for each Calcium you have.

${modID}:CalcitrateCard.NAME: Calcitrate
${modID}:CalcitrateCard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Deals additional damage equal to Calcium gained this combat.
${modID}:CalcitrateCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Deals additional damage equal to Calcium gained this combat.

${modID}:SkullCrackCard.NAME: Skull Crack
${modID}:SkullCrackCard.DESCRIPTION: Lose 5 health, unless you have at least !M! Calcium. NL Deal !D! damage.
${modID}:SkullCrackCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose 5 health, unless you have at least !M! Calcium. NL Deal !D! damage.

${modID}:DuckAndDiveCard.NAME: Duck and Dive
${modID}:DuckAndDiveCard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Next turn gain !B! Block.
${modID}:DuckAndDiveCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Next turn gain !B! Block.

${modID}:GlassFormCard.NAME: Glass Form
${modID}:GlassFormCard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Thorns whenever you are attacked.
${modID}:GlassFormCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Thorns whenever you are attacked.

${modID}:ReflectiveSurfaceCard.NAME: Reflective Surface
${modID}:ReflectiveSurfaceCard.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to the target's Block. If the target has no Block, double your Block instead.
${modID}:ReflectiveSurfaceCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to the target's Block. If the target has no Block, double your Block instead.

${modID}:TrailOfGlassCard.NAME: Trail of Glass
${modID}:TrailOfGlassCard.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Thorns. Gain Block equal to !M! times your Thorns.
${modID}:TrailOfGlassCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Thorns. Gain Block equal to !M! times your Thorns.

${modID}:ShieldOfShardsCard.NAME: Shield of Shards
${modID}:ShieldOfShardsCard.DESCRIPTION: Transform your Thorns into Plated Armor.
${modID}:ShieldOfShardsCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Transform your Thorns into Plated Armor.

${modID}:GlassBottlesCard.NAME: Glass Bottles
${modID}:GlassBottlesCard.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Thorns when you play empty bottle.
${modID}:GlassBottlesCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Thorns when you play empty bottle.

${modID}:GlassBankCard.NAME: Glass Bank
${modID}:GlassBankCard.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Thorns for every !M! cards in your draw pile.
${modID}:GlassBankCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Thorns for every !M! cards in your draw pile.

${modID}:GlassCutCard.NAME: Glass Cut
${modID}:GlassCutCard.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Thorns. Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Weak.
${modID}:GlassCutCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Thorns. Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Weak.

${modID}:SafekeepingCard.NAME: Safekeeping
${modID}:SafekeepingCard.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block next turn equal to your current Block. Lose all your Block. (Don't lose Block.)
${modID}:SafekeepingCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block next turn equal to your current Block. Lose all your Block. (Don't lose Block.)

${modID}:MarkDoorCard.NAME: Mark Door
${modID}:MarkDoorCard.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Deliverance to an enemy. Exhaust.
${modID}:MarkDoorCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Deliverance to an enemy. Exhaust.

${modID}:CremeDeLaCremeCard.NAME: Crème de la Crème
${modID}:CremeDeLaCremeCard.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Milk card, Upgrade ALL cards in your hand for the rest of this combat.
${modID}:CremeDeLaCremeCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Milk card, Upgrade ALL cards in your hand for the rest of this combat.
